question: 三角形
userExplanation: <ja>三角</ja> means "triangle." Well this means triangle too, but it's the mathematical term. You should use it in math class.
sourceMnemonic: You already learned that <ja>三角</ja> means "triangle." Well this means <vocabulary>triangle</vocabulary> too, but it's the mathematical term. You should use it in math class.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
